channel.title: A Few Noob Questions that I need answered
channel.description: 1) How can I change the way my NPC's face? 2) I've set RangeX and RangeY and changed the walktype to 2, in autospawn.cfg yet the monsters will will not walk around. 3) Somebody please give me the codes, or a freaking link to PROPER working potions. (I.E strength potions, your strength loweres from 117 strength back to 99 within a set of time etc)

item.title: A Few Noob Questions that I need answered
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

  1. Thank you, but I’m sure I’ve seen it in servers too…
  2. I’ve tried that, they stay quite still.
  3. I have, all of them do not work :S

Read full topic
item.source: A Few Noob Questions that I need answered

item.title: A Few Noob Questions that I need answered
item.dc:creator: @Ruppich Ruppich
item.description:
@Ruppich wrote:

  1. Probably you can do Client wise…
  2. Im not sure, you try attacking it and walking off a bit to see if it chases?
  3. Use search?

Read full topic
